body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Sunset over New River Gorge. Louise McLaughlin   Â    There is no fee to enter New River Gorge National River. Enjoy your visit! If you plan to visit other national parks with an entrance fee, learn more about the America the Beautiful - The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass series and fee free days in national parks.
title: New River Gorge National River: Fees & Passes
